Title of Labour Hero awarded to builders of youth hero motorway 
    Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A decree of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was issued on march 21 to award the title of DPRK Labour Hero to builders of the youth hero motorway in recognition of their distinguished labour exploits performed in its construction.
 This title went to 34 officials and members of youth shock brigades who, true to the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, performed distinguished labour exploits in building the modern youth hero motorway, a great monumental edifice in the era of the workers' party, in a short span of time by displaying the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of unconditionally carrying out his instructions despite difficulties and ordeals in the period of the "arduous march" and forced march, according to the decree.
